description: Manages a Data Factory Azure Integration Runtime.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

ComputeType.description: Compute type of the cluster which will execute data flow job. Valid values are `General`, `ComputeOptimized` and `MemoryOptimized`. Defaults to `General`.

CoreCount.description: Core count of the cluster which will execute data flow job. Valid values are `8`, `16`, `32`, `48`, `80`, `144` and `272`. Defaults to `8`.

DataFactoryName.description: Specifies the name of the Data Factory the Managed Integration Runtime belongs to. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

Location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

Name.description: Specifies the name of the Managed Integration Runtime. Changing this forces a new resource to be created. Must be globally unique. See the [Microsoft documentation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/data-factory/naming-rules) for all restrictions.

ResourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the Managed Integration Runtime. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

TimeToLiveMin.description: Time to live (in minutes) setting of the cluster which will execute data flow job. Defaults to `0`.
